text: @realDonaldTrump While CoVid-19 fills the news, what else is the House of Representatives doing? House Bill H.R 5717 will add 30% tax on all guns and a 50% tax on all ammo, this is trying to pushed thru immediately! Pass this on and vote NO! Please pass this on to everyone.  #EndShutDown
